issue.title: nowebsites.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://nowebsites.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnowebsites.com) ### Comment > Please find a solution to the filter update issue, this message appears when there is no new filter update, but if there is an update, the message appears, for example, 10 filters have been updated. But it sometimes shows up when there is an update to the filters. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://dopebox.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdopebox.to) ### Comment > When I got AdGuard it was not working (made website not load) so I turned it off and uninstalled but I still could not load the website. Re installing and turning it off again does not work. Is it possible to reset this somehow? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/abcsb9l25ts08sookc884c0kg48c0sgpo5f2i9e59w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2ndfxssy9rggc0s44s0ogsww4s0scg8q54g21orfq8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.9 License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | Norton antivirus
